hadiths.text: Narrated Al-Harith bin Malik bin Al-Barsa': "On the day of the Conquest of Makkah, I heard the Prophet (ï·º) saying: 'This is not to be battled over after today, until the Day of Judgement.'" [Abu 'Eisa said:] There are narrations on this topic from Ibn 'Abbas, Sulaiman bin Surad, and Muti' This Hadith is Hasan Sahih, and it is a narration of Zakariyya bin Abi Za'idah from Ash-Sha'bi, we do not know of it except from his narration
